content:
Hey would love some feedback on https://github.com/bytecodealliance/wasm-pkg-tools/pull/161 -- It would enable some work I'd like to land in cargo-component (feedback welcome on that too, happy to change the approach)

feat: support specifying OCI namespace details on RegistryMetadata by vados-cosmonic 路 Pull Request #161 路 bytecodealliance/wasm-pkg-tools
This commit adds support for specifying OCI namespace details on a RegistryMetadata and avoiding introducing the feature as a breaking change by utilizing an opt-in feature.
